alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 02 at 4:13AM PST until December 03 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 2 feet along the Cascade Crest, 6 and 10 inches for Blewett Pass, and 3 to 7 inches for Leavenworth and the Methow Valley. * WHERE...Winthrop, Holden Village, Twisp, Methow, Stehekin, Plain, Conconully, Leavenworth, Stevens Pass, Loup Loup Pass, and Mazama. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Motorists should be prepared for winter driving conditions across the Cascade Passes and along the East Slopes of the Cascades.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Persons should consider delaying all travel. Consider taking a winter storm kit along with you, including such items as tire chains, booster cables, flashlight, shovel, blankets and extra clothing. Also take water, a first aid kit, and anything else that would help you survive in case you become stranded.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County
